p: FS is founder and CEO of NeuroInnovation Oy, has received a grant from Renishaw, consulting fees from Herantis Pharma and Orion, lecture fees from Abbvie, UCB, Zambon, and Orion, travel support from Abbvie, Herantis Pharma, Global Kinetics, UCB, NordicInfu Care, Zambon, and Medtronic. He is member of the scientific advisory boards of Axial Biotherapeutics and LivaNova.
